name: Iron tools pipeline
goal: Efficiently craft a full set of iron tools (1 iron_pickaxe, 1 iron_axe, one iron_shovel, and 1 iron_sword)
notes: It is very important to follow step-by-step. Verification steps are CRITICAL to ensure items are picked up before crafting.

steps.title: Step 1: Mine 3 Oak Logs
checks: Have 3 oak_log or more in inventory

steps.title: Step 2: Verify Oak Logs
steps.details: Check inventory for '3 oak_log'. This verifies you have picked them up.

steps.title: Step 4: Craft 1 Crafting Table
steps.details: Craft '1 crafting_table' (4 oak_plank) and place it on the ground.
checks: A crafting_table is perceived on the ground

steps.title: Step 6: Craft a Wooden Pickaxe
steps.details: Using a crafting_table you placed, craft '1 wooden_pickaxe' (3 oak_plank & 2 stick) and equip it - REQUIRED to mine stone.

steps.title: Step 7: Mine 11 Cobblestone
steps.details: Mine stone with your wooden_pickaxe to get '11 cobblestone'.
checks: Have 11 cobblestone or more in inventory

steps.title: Step 8: Verify Cobblestone
steps.details: Check inventory for '11 cobblestone'. This verifies you have picked them up.

steps.title: Step 9: Craft a Stone Pickaxe
steps.details: Using the crafting_table you placed, craft '1 stone_pickaxe' (3 cobblestone + 2 stick) and equip it â€” REQUIRED to mine iron_ore.

steps.title: Step 10: Mine 2 Coal
steps.details: Mine until you have '2 coal'. You need at least 2 coal to smelt 9 iron_ore.

steps.title: Step 11: Verify coal
steps.details: Check inventory for '2 coal'. This verifies you have picked them up.

steps.title: Step 12: Mine 9 Iron Ore
steps.details: Locate iron_ore using perception. Mine 9 iron_ore (it drops raw_iron) with your stone_pickaxe.
checks: Have 9 raw_iron or more in inventory

steps.title: Step 13: Verify Raw Iron
steps.details: Check inventory for '9 raw_iron'. This verifies you have picked them up.

steps.title: Step 14: Craft Furnace
steps.details: Using the crafting_table you placed, craft '1 furnace' (8 cobblestone) and place it on the ground.
checks: A furnace is perceived on the ground

steps.title: Step 15: Smelt 9 Iron Ingots
steps.details: Place '9 raw_iron' in the top slot of the furnace and '2 coal' in the bottom slot. Smelt all '9 raw_iron' into '9 iron_ingot'. Withdraw all '9 iron_ingot' when they are finished smelting.
checks: Have 9 iron_ingot or more in inventory

steps.title: Step 16: Craft All Iron Tools
steps.details: Using the crafting_table, craft in this priority order: 1) iron_pickaxe (3 iron_ingot + 2 stick), 2) iron_sword (2 iron_ingot + 1 stick), 3) iron_axe (3 iron_ingot + 2 stick), 4) iron_shovel (1 iron_ingot + 2 stick). Total: 9 iron_ingot + 7 stick.

steps.title: Step 17: Equip Tools
steps.details: Equip iron_pickaxe. Verify all 4 items were crafted successfully by checking inventory. The Iron Tools Pipeline is complete when you have: iron_pickaxe, iron_sword, iron_shovel, iron_axe.
